testcase.classname: To Validate the functionality of Myntra application
testcase.name: Search Item
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the chrome browser and maximize window......................passed When To Type and search the T-Shirt product.................................passed When To Select the first product and select the M size......................passed And To click the Add To Bag button and close the current tab................passed When To click the bag icon..................................................passed And Take the screenshot selected bag........................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
